p:
Within-host viral dynamics, CD4 progression patterns, probabilities of dying of AIDS, testing procedures, and transmission probabilities were, for the most part, identical to those in previous studies using
Evonet_HIV [ 33â€“ 35]. In the sections below, we summarize features that differ from these previous studies and/or that relate specifically to age (i.e., the key assumptions of this study). Additional details about the software are given in S1 Supplementary Methods and at github.com/EvoNetHIV.
